00042 VertexPMeanP::VertexPMeanP( double p, ElemSampleQM* metric )
00043     : PMeanPMetric( p ),
00044       mMetric(metric)
00045     {}

00049 std::string VertexPMeanP::get_name() const
00050 {
00051   std::string result("VertexPMeanP(");
00052   result += mMetric->get_name();
00053   result += ")";
00054   return result;

00060 bool VertexPMeanP::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00061                           size_t handle, 
00062                           double& value, 
00063                           MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   mHandles.clear();
00066   get_vertex_corner_handles( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00067   bool result = average( pd, get_quality_metric(), mHandles, value, err );
00068   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 bool VertexPMeanP::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd, 
00073                           size_t handle, 
00074                           double& value, 
00075                           std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00076                           MsqError& err )
00077 {
00078   ElemSampleQM* qm = get_quality_metric();
00079   mHandles.clear();
00080   get_vertex_corner_handles( pd, handle, mHandles, err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00081   bool result = average_with_indices( pd, qm, mHandles, value, indices, err );
00082   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00083 }
